definitions.definition: Any of various shrubs or small trees of the genus Rhus and other genera in Anacardiaceae

subdefinitions.definition: particularly, one of species Rhus coriaria ( tanner's sumac )

definitions.definition: Dried and chopped-up leaves and stems of a plant of the genus Rhus , particularly tanner's sumac (see sense 1) , used for dyeing and tanning leather or for medicinal purposes.
A sour spice popular in the Eastern Mediterranean , made from the berries of tanner's sumac .

main_definition: Any of various shrubs or small trees of the genus Rhus and other genera in Anacardiaceae
secondary_definitions: Dried and chopped-up leaves and stems of a plant of the genus Rhus , particularly tanner's sumac (see sense 1) , used for dyeing and tanning leather or for medicinal purposes.
A sour spice popular in the Eastern Mediterranean , made from the berries of tanner's sumac .
